name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Ft. Lauderdale Airport/Cruise

reviews.text: I booked a room at this hotel at last minute and wasn't expecting too much though I have to say the HI Express hotels are generally very nice. This was far beyond my expectations. Nice location close to I-95 and FLL, and at a very short driving distance from Las Olas Blvd. and Fort Lauderdale beaches. The staff at the front desk was very nice, especially Daneila, a young woman from Costa Rica. I was received with a small present for being a member of IHG rewards program. This will be my first choice for any future visit to the FLL area, and I hope sweet Daneila is there when I check in again.
reviews.title: Simply awesome

reviews.text: The hotel looks in excellent condition. And the room was in top condition too. HI Express: I shall return.
reviews.title: Good enough

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night with my husband and our niece. Not the fanciest hotel, but we didn't need that.. We only needed a place to sleep while shopping at Sawgrass Mills, before we got on the biggest boat ever the next day :) Sawgrass Mills was awesome and only a short cab ride away! Same with Oasis Of The Seas, the "little" boat!
reviews.title: Quick getaway! Great value & stay!

reviews.text: The front desk was always polite and helpful, they had a pool (that we didn't use..), roomy, clean and nice rooms with a comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.text: I just checked out of the Holiday Inn Express and I had to write this review. The best thing I can say is QUALITY & SERVICE!
reviews.title: Stayed night prior to cruise out of Miami

reviews.text: We stayed here one night before we headed out to the airport in the morning. When we got there, the lobby was cool and the front desk was very nice. We checked in within minutes. However, my first room, 513, had a broken AC. The temperature was set to 73 and it was 83 degrees in the room. Hot air was coming out of the AC. I went to my parents' room, 515, and their thermostat was set to 73 and it was cold! So, I called the front desk and I was told someone would be up to take a look. After fidgeting with the thermometer and lowering it to 60 degrees, he told me to wait 1 hour! I walked over to the AC and hot air was still coming out. And, the temperature went up to 84 at this point! I refused to wait at 10PM to see if the room will cool down... and I called the front desk. They immediately switched me over to a different, cool room and it was great. We set up the shuttle to the airport, which runs every hour, to 6:05AM.
reviews.title: No problems

reviews.text: And, the best part??? They have free breakfast. It's supposed to start at 6, but, it was already all set up by 5:45AM. We all got to eat a little something before we left and we were grateful. If they have a shuttle to the beach, we're seriously considering staying here the next time we come out to Ft. Lauderdale.
reviews.title: Transit hotel
Excellent for short and long stays
reviews.text: The hotel is well located if you're waiting for a flight or cruise. It offers free shuttle from/to both the Airport or Cruise terminals. Nicely appointed rooms with fridge ans microwave. At par with other Holiday Inn Express. The staff is specially nice. I'm Platinum with IHG and you get a bottle of water and snacks upon arrival. Rooms could be cleaner my room was clearly not vacumed there was pieces of food all over.
The area where the hotel is located is not that great hence the title Transit hotel. You don't go there vacationing you go there because you are in route to somewhere else.
reviews.title: Friendly Environment
Excellent location, friendly staff
reviews.text: There is a small mall in front with fast food restaurants and a Big Lot store.
We stayed at this hotel for one night prior to our cruise. We chose it because of the rates, reviews and proximity to the cruise port at Ft. Lauderdale.
reviews.title: Great hotel especially for cruisers

reviews.text: The hotel was all we expected it to be.. clean, efficient and it was a good location. There is a strip mall across the street with a grocery store as well as a Wendy's for a quick burger or an authentic German restaurant just down the street within walking distance.
reviews.title: Apic Conference attendee 2013 Gail from PE Canada

reviews.text: The neighborhood was one of the better ones in this area it was clean and upkept as opposed to several others we passed by that looked dirty and dark. We enjoyed walking around the outside,down the street, and across the street and felt very safe.
reviews.title: A solid stay for the $$

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was extra friendly and helpful and the free breakfast buffet was very fresh and tasty with a lot of hot and cold items. They have a free shuttle from the airport and a shuttle to the cruise port for a $10 fee.
reviews.title: Good Pre-Cruise Hotel Choice

reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this hotel if you are looking for a place to stay the night before your cruise or even for a longer stay while on vacation.
reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!

reviews.text: I stayed here for about two weeks during a 3 week work trip to FLL that involved staying at 3 hotels. Although it gets a lot of cruise traffic, it's actually quite good for long-term guests as well. The rooms are well designed to minimize hallways noise, placing the beds far from the doorway. Small kitchenette with a micro, sink and small refrigerator, allows you to stock up a bit---at the Winn Dixie right across the street. Laundry on the floor was only a buck for washer or dryer, and the machines were good. The shuttle will pick you up or take you out to the airport whenever needed, and they also were available for side trips to our offices on the airport but not at the terminal. The front desk folks are very friendly and helpful, and the maids were happy to adjust my cleaning schedule to account for my VERY early morning schedule that got me back to my room mid-day. Never had a chance to try the breakfast, nor the pool, and I had my own wifi hotspot so can't comment on that, either. But, all in all, a very satisfactory hotel.
reviews.title: Good for long-term stay.

reviews.text: The hotel stay was nice. I rolled into town pretty late as my plane was delayed. The shuttle picked me up right outside my terminal and the front desk attendant Sarah had everything ready to go for us. The room was clean and well kept, modern and business friendly. Fast internet access as well. I stayed for a week, and the service just got better each time. Sarah was normally at the front desk and would greet my associates and myself as we ended our days. She informed us to go grab a cookie that she had made fresh from the oven. The complementary breakfast was nice as well. Pancakes, eggs, sausage, biscuits and gravy. Overall- 5/5 for value and cleanliness, 5'5 Thanks to Sarah and her smile and hello's, and the location couldn't have been more perfect for my stay. Close to the freeway, but no sound from the traffic. I slept well.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice, newly decorated hotel.On a busy Hwy, but never a problem.
reviews.title: comfortable stay

reviews.text: Room was clean, modern ,comfortable. Breakfast was pretty standard fare in a nice setting.Pool looked nice, but didn't use it.
reviews.title: Worst customer service

reviews.text: When I book a Holiday Inn Express , I want what a HI Express offers..this one does.
reviews.title: Stay here if you are Bahamas Bound

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Ft. Lauderdale Airport/Cruise
description: Take a Virtual Tour of the hotel.The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Ft. Lauderdale Airport/Cruise Port is located near the Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood Int'l Airport, Port Everglades Cruise Port & Broward County Convention Center - the perfect choice for a business or leisure stay. The beaches, Shops of Las Olas, Riverwalk Arts & Entertainment district, downtown, Museums, Theaters, Malls and a variety of restaurants & local attractions are all within a short drive.The hotel pampers guests daily by serving a complimentary 'Express Start breakfast bar' along with USA Today news. Free high-speed Internet access is available in all guest rooms & suites plus free local calls, microwave/fridge, & coffee maker. The Marina Mile Meeting Room, Express Board Room & business center features high-speed Internet access. Adding to the many guest amenities & services to assure your stay is comfortable & pleasant an exercise room with state-of-the-art equipment, Coin laundry room, and outdoor heated pool in a tropical garden setting are on-site.A complimentary shuttle is available from 5:30 AM to midnight to and from the Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood Int'l Airport. Drop-off transportation to Port Everglades cruise port is available on a complimentary basis. 'A completely non-smoking hotel.'
